en-US.name: 2020 Democratic Candidate Quiz
en-US.summary: Find out which Democratic candidates agree with you on all the issues.
en-US.description:
Find out which Democratic Candidates agree with you on all the issues.

Answer 20 questions on issues facing the US and see which Democratic candidates see eye to eye.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Democratic Candidates Quiz"

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"
examplePhrases: Alexa, who should I vote for

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Include your testing instruction (if any) here
